## ***e*<span style="color:gold">MathLab</span> (FREE Online Tutoring)**

Department of Mathematical Sciences at Appalachian State University is excited to offer online tutoring for the first time. This is a free service for the students enrolled in <span style="color:navy">**MAT 1025 -- Pre-Calculus**</span>.

Check out how to start and the tutoring schedule for Spring 2018 below.

## **How to Start?**
1. Click on the relevent tutoring session's link in the *Online Tutoring Schedule* above.
2. **"Allow"** zoom.us to open.
3. If you are a first time zoom user, you may need to install zoom in this step.
4. Click **"Join"** in the Zoom - Pro Account window.

<div style="text-align:center">
<p float="center">
  <img src="./images/join.png" width="200" />

</p>
</div>

5. Use the dropdown menu to select YOUR tutoring session.

<div style="text-align:center">
<p float="center">
  <img src="./images/drop1.png" width="200" />
  <img src="./images/drop2.png" width="200" /> 

</p>
</div>

6. You will be directed to the "whiteboard".

Note: If your tutor is online, step 1 should take you directly to the "whiteboard".
